# NWConnection.SendCompletion.idempotent

**Case**

Mark the sent data as idempotent—data that can be sent multiple times.

## Declaration

```swift
case idempotent
```

## Completions

- **NWConnection.SendCompletion.contentProcessed(_:)**: Provide a completion handler that’s invoked when the sent data is processed by the stack.
